title: Must return an error response for an assignee user who doesn't have a solicitor role for the jurisdiction of the case
specs: S1 - with a solicitor role under an organisation to assign a case role to another solicitor within the same organisation
U2 - who does not have a solicitor role for the jurisdiction of C1 but works within the same organisation as S1
intends to assign access within the same organisation for U2 by S1

body.message: Intended assignee has to be a solicitor enabled in the jurisdiction of the case.
